name: Part-Time Fisher
description:
Part-Time Fisher

My submission for Mini Jam 91: UFO, with the limitation of 'Fish as a mechanic'!

You play an alien who has crash landed on Earth, and of all places but a fishing pond! Instead of getting all wet, the alien decided to fish up the spaceship parts that have sunk, and is only missing 5 of them to be able to repair his ship!

Due to other stuff going on in life, I couldn't finish the one as much as I wanted to, and the game had intended to have a lot more to do with the UFO side of things, but the game is still fun in its current state :)

Controls

Left Mouse Click - Cast line / catch fish

W / S - Move the bubble on the slider up and down

Credit

Art created by me

Sounds/music from zapsplat.com
